titleStmt.title: Callirhoe, the nymph of Aberdene, resuscitat by William Barclay M. of Art, and Doctor of Physicke. What diseases may be cured by drinking of the well at Aberdene, and what is the true vse thereof
titleStmt.author: Barclay, William, 1570?-1630?

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
